columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for billing events

columns.description: Foreign key reference to users table

columns.description: Type of billing event

columns.description: Billing amount for the event

columns.name: EVENT_DATE
columns.description: Date when the billing event occurred

columns.description: Date when feature usage occurred

common_patterns.primary_key_pattern: Most tables use ID columns as primary keys

data_quality_notes.timestamp_consistency: All tables include audit timestamps for data lineage
data_quality_notes.source_tracking: SOURCE_SYSTEM column enables multi-source data integration
data_quality_notes.data_types: Most columns use VARCHAR(16777216) for flexibility
